text:
Yoo Abha (bachcho ne ye naam rakha tha tera lol) 
This is definitely the toughest memoir that I am going to write.
Wing, Humanoid, Takneek, Roboclub, H205 - in sab ke saath kitni achchi memories judi hai apni. 
Orientation ke time tu wing ka sabse energetic aur enthu wala banda laga tha mujhe. Aur ye reputation tune jald hi waapas gain kar liya tha.
Humanoid team ke liye tera dedication alag level tha bhai. From my point of view, ek time aisa tha jab Humanoid team was mainly Abhay Varshney. Is point se waapas team build karne mein tera hi sabse bada contribution tha. Team ko South Korea leke jaane mein bhi tera hi sabse bada (technical aur non-technical dono) contribution tha hi. Sabhi ne give up kar diya tha, tab bhi tu data raha, aur end mein funds collect ar hi liye! Itna persistence kisi mein nahi hota bhai. Iske liye massive respect hai tere liye.
2nd year Takneek ke time teri Hall feel bohot paas se dekhi maine. HEC ki post chod ke Hall Captain banne ki soch raha tha tu, itna man tha tera Takneek jeetane ka. Raat raat bhar jagke bachcho ke saath baith ke bots banwaaye the tune. Yahi sab dekh ke to Y18 ke laundo mein hall feel aayi hogi!
Roboclub mein bhi you ‘led by example’. Mainly teri wajah se hi maine renom mein apply kiya tha (you may not agree here XD) Summers mein 3-legged jumping robot ke bachcho ko ek point pe pyaar ho gaya tha tujhse <3 Tech Meet ke bot pe bhi tune god-level kaam kiya, aur karwaya. Dedication aur persistence - you personify these qualities. You completely deserve the SnT Excellence Award!
I know I wasn’t the best of all room-mates, par haan, maine bhi kaafi grow kiya hai personally H205 mein. It got over extremely abruptly though.
Maze bhi bohot kiye hai apan ne, aur tere bohot maze bhi liye hai. Tere Dilbar dance ki video banaane ko tu dhoka maanta hai, par mai usko farz maanta hu. Ye maine tujhe bohot baar bola hai- “Agar tu sirf dost hota to mai video nahi banaata, par tu bohot achcha dost hai isliye maine video banayi”
Tu Bangalore, mai Mumbai aur Jay Gurgaon - could things get any worse? 
Par milte hai bhai jald hi. All the Best!
Love you bro <3
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Bhai Marathi mein memoir likh ke dil khush kar diya tune <3
Humne kitni saari football matches ek saath “dekhi” hai, kaafi interesting football discussions kiye hai. 
Bhai tu bhi United fan ban gaya to mujhe bohot khushi hogi. Maine is saal football achche se follow kiya hai (believe it or not, bohot saari matches poori dekhi hai). It's a good time to be a United fan right now.
Apart from football bhi bohot achchi memories hai tumhare saath <3
Jald hi milte hai bhai. All the best!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Yo Bahubali!
1st year se hi bohot mast aadmi lagta tha tu. 1st year summers mein apan room-mates the thode time ke liye, tab bohot maza aaya tha. Tere saath ki kuch bohot mast badminton matches yaad hai mujhe. Aero club ka tera dedication dekh ke bohot sahi lagta tha, aur thoda inferiority complex bhi aata tha. Corona ke chakkar mein mil nahi paaye hum college mein, par teri job location Mumbai aa gayi to mai bohot khush hunga! Milte hai jald hi bhai
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text: Thankfully tu GPLs mein 2-3 laath hi maarta tha. Aise hi zindagi mein chaapte rehna bhai!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
“Dost wali feeling kam, bhai wali jyada aati hai” ye ekdum hi sach kaha yaar tune. 

Bhai teri Sainik School ki stories to mast lagti thi mujhe- kaise tu seniors ka maar khaata tha and all XD ek mobile charger ki story achche se yaad hai mujhe. Train wali, aur Sports meets wali stories bhi yaad hai. Teri ye light-hearted stories detailed descriptions ke saath sunna patience ka kaam to hota tha, par mazaa bhi bohot aata tha. 

Tune ek baar bataya tha ki subah bhaagne jaana ho to brush waapas aake karna XD subah ki exercise ke liye ye mai aaj bhi follow karta hu bhai. Mai first year mein to randomly pride ke saath tere baare mein brag karta tha- “mera roommate 800 logo ki marathon mein just thodese margin se 2nd aaya”. 

Bohot interesting roommate tha yaar tu- first year meis tu jis passion se apna hockey pursue karta tha wo mujhe bohot motivate karta tha. Hockey, Clash of Clans, professional singing, MSO201 jaisa mushkil course- tu jaha bhi apna 100% deta hai, waha chaap hi deta hai. Bohot achchi memories attached hai meri in sab se <3

Glad to have you as an integral part of my IITK journey bhai. Milte hai jald hi!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Yoo Saini bro!! 

Remember how lockdown happened just before Techkriti in our 3rd year. Bohot achchi planning ke saath prep chal rahi thi. Apne time apan chart-paper pe tape lagaake kar rahe the practice, is baar 3 hafte pehle hi practice arena print hoke aa gaya tha! Jitni mehnat humne last ke 2-3 dino mein ki thi, utni mehnat 1-2 hafte ke liye bachcho se karaata. Phir to jeet hi jaate Techkriti, right? <3

Of course, bolna aasan hota hai, but maine IARC mein apna 100% deke agle 10 saal ke liye small robotics ka ek strong base banaane ka plan banaya tha- a “goal” that was inspired by your hardwork, dedication and attitude from a year ago! 

Apni Techkriti ke time bhi tera dedication dekh ke kaam karne aata tha mai. I had never seen anyone work day and night on something before. (tu at least 2 raat soya hi nahi tha) Ye mai pehle bhi bol chuka hu tumhe- Honestly, maine tere saath kaam nahi kiya hota to mai shayad hi apply karta coordinator ke liye. Thanks a tonne for all the motivation bro! Also thanks a lot for being a constant well-wisher of Robotics Club and being an integral part of the roboclub family in our 3rd year as well!

All the Best for all your future endeavors bro! Lets hope we meet again soon.
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
GenSec sir!
Haan, apni dosti thodi late hui, par tere se baat karne mein humesha hi mazaa aata hai. Stock market, paisa, alumni reunions, daaru, politics aise kitne saare interesting discussions yaad hai tere saath ke <3
Tumhare wing mein jab tune dog hut banaane ke initiative liya tha tab tere liye respect aur badh gayi thi. Aise achche kaam karte rehna bhai <3
Bohot energetic aur “feel wala” aadmi hai tu, matlab har cheez 100 percent feel ke saath karta hai.Alumni Reunion wale sessions aur SCGP mein certificates wala initiative chapwa diya tune bro! Aise hi bakchodi karte rehna bhai.
Kab milenge pata nahi, par apan poker + bulla nights karte rahenge yaar regularly.
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Yoo Monika! 
It was great to know you! Kaafi interesting personality ho tum XD
Firstly, meri handwriting ki taareef karne ke liye thanks :)
Jab lab partners the tab maine ek cheez observe ki thi- iItni frustrating lab mein bhi tum ekdum hi shaant aur thande dimaag se sochti thi, aur maine tumhe kabhi bhi gussa hote hue nahi dekha tha. Ye bohot respectable lagta hai mujhe.  
Udghosh ka failed plan yaad hai? Wo kaafi unlucky tha :P
Yess Library vs CCD ka debate yaad hai mujhe XD mai aaya tha CCD, par phir hum waha se Library gaye. So nope, you did not win :P
Milte hai kabhi. All the Best!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Yo Pari!
Wing ki walls pe itni achchi illustrations banaane ke liye thanks <3 bohot achcha laga photos dekh ke. GPLs mein bohot zyada na maarne ke liye thanks, tumhari taekwondo kicks bohot zor se lagti.
Milte hai jald hi, All the Best!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Yoo Aysuh!
It was amazing to know you man! Right from Electromania in our first year, maine tujhe bohot interesting aur brainy cheeze karte hue dekha hai. Tera passion aur dedication humesha alag level the- may it be your passion for McLaren racing, for the Australian Cricket team or for your Vox articles! 
Since I have entered your domain of finance, I am sure our paths are going to cross sometime soon XD tab tak F1 to hai hi <3 All the Best man!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Ayush bhai!
Humanoid ke early days mein jab hum mile the, tabhi se hi tere liye massive respect tha. Techkriti ke time manually coordinates set karke bot chalaana was fun XD Tumse bohot kuch seekhne ko mila, thanks a tonne for that. Aage bhi sikhaate rehna. Also bhai, tere saamne humility nahi, genuine inferiority complex hota hai :) All the Best for all your endeavors man!
Milte hai Mumbai mein jald hi.
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text: Humne mainly 1st year ke udghosh mein basketball court pe score maintain karte time interact kiya tha. I dont know what I was doing there, but your company actually made it fun <3 Uske baad wing mein hi milna hota tha apna. Milte hai bhai kabhi. All the Best!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Hey there ICPC partner!
Yes, ICPC was really fun. So were all our interactions. 
All the Best to you too man!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Jay Bhai!
Bohot mast aadmi ho tum.
1st year mein Phy102 aur ESC101 ka discussion yaad hai mujhe. Sahi tha wo :)
Kabhi bhi eco ya finance ka discussion chal raha ho to tera naam aata hi hai mere dimaag mein- itna zyada chaapa hai aapne sir! 
Eco double major ke liye tumne convince kar hi diya tha bhai mujhe (phir summer course mein bohot gandi grading hui aur mera man khatam ho gaya lol)  
Tu kitna lucky hai ki tune college mein Suman sir ke saath kaam kiya - ye baat bohot baar bol chuka hu tumhe aur Mumbai mein bhi bolta rahunga. Hope to meet you soon!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text: The first memory that I recollect of us is waiting outside the bathroom at 8 am together for our turn. First year mein hum kaafi ajeeb the I guess XD
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
(Firstly, pehle wala memoir trial tha. You can delete that at will.)

The first memory that I recollect of us is waiting outside the bathroom at 8 am together for our turn (Campus tour bus wala bhi yaad aa raha hai, but I think Bathroom line wala pehle hua) First year mein hum kaafi ajeeb the I guess XD

Achche dost banne se pehle hi tere creative side ke liye respect aa gaya tha- Art105 ka “Endsem hila denge” song, teri maa wali poem, tera synthesizer bajaane ka passion (ye maybe choti cheez ho, but I have not seen anyone else play a song on a synthesizer without having learnt that song before). In sab cheezo ko aage bhi time dete rehna bro. 

One of the first most memorable nights on campus for me was the time tu, mai, Nikunj OAT ki chat pe gaye the. Is night ko 4 saal bhi nahi hue, par phir bhi bohot puraani baat lag rahi hai mujhe. 

My life at IITK would have been incomplete without you man. Blue World ke Columbus ki ride se Placements ki ride tak sab saath mein hi kiya hai apan ne. I agree that among all our friends, we spent the most time together, did so many things together. Aawaz karne wale tere yellow sandals, Udghosh PR, Tech Meet prep aur Mumbai saath mein jaana (btw this was the only time jab hum dono room-mates the- for 2 days I guess), Agra ki trip, courses saath mein padhna and projects saath mein karna, Takneek, summers mein Acting Gensec ka kaam, Robo vs Batti ki rivalry, aur mere room pe kiye hue random discussions- in sab se bohot achchi memories attached hai meri <3

Koi bhi semester ho ya Tech Meet ka sabse challenging Problem Statement- “is baar to sahi mein doob gaya” kehke alag level randi rona karne ke baad bhi har baar chaap hi deta hai tu. 

Of course, regrets bhi kaafi hai. 3rd sem ke tere dasse ki khushi nahi dekh paaya tha yaar mai, although tu dassa aate hi mere room pe aaya tha bataana :/ Campus na aane ka regret to pata hi hai tujhe. Aur tere saath bhand hona (abhi ke liye) reh gaya yaar bas. Wo bhi Inter IIT jeetaane ke celebration mein! Ye moment miss karna bohot hi zyada regret karunga mai. 

Par chill hai, apan mil hi lenge jald hi. Mere ancestors bhi Chittor se hi hai, isliye tu mujhe Chittod ki ek trip karaane wala hi hai for sure :)
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Dipak Bhau!
It was great to know you man! Humne saath mein kaam bas ek project pe kiya tha. Bohot systematically karwaaya tha tumne wo, I got to learn a lot from you then. Thank you for that sir. Aur tumhare saath hangout karne mein bhi bohot maza aaya tha. 
Yes, jald hi mil ke Badam 7 khelenge pakka!
All the best to you too!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Yo Pence!
As you said, we met pretty late. But I had known you right from 1st year, because of this amazing team that you led. If you remember, I said this in a Council meeting too- Team Aerial Robotics has an ideal structure and all teams should follow it, since all students coming out of Aerial Robotics are technically the most sound. From what I know, you (and maybe a couple of seniors) are the brains behind Aerial Robotics’ foundational success and I have mad respect for you. Also, I think I should apologize to Mudit for spoiling his treat by bringing the Ashwin agenda XD, but I am sure tujhe bhi pata hai wo kitna important tha.  
Let’s meet sometime soon. All the Best!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
911414140914
Har hafte at least ek baar ye joke yaad karke mai randomly hasta rehta hu XD 
Aise hi bohot saari achchi memories hai tere saath bro.
Apan dono wing ke DOPA, DOGA the, isse baat start hui thi. Phir Art105 mein saath mein movie banayi thi, kaafi mazaa aaya tha. 2nd sem mein tera dekh ke maine bhi baal bohot chote kar diye the. This turned out to be a good decision, iske liye thank you XD
Agra trip mein to alag hi level mazaa aaya tha bhai. Haan, Men Who Built America wala discussion achche se yaad hai mujhe. Glad to know tujhe bhi yaad hai :)
Tera goggle bohot pasand hai mujhe. Last sem mein campus aata to pakke se chura leta :(
Tune Sarthak ko thoda zyada hi bigaad diya par XD
Jald hi milte hai bhai, haan Mumbai-Bangalore paas hi hai. Love you bro <3
Haan bhai, baal lambe hi hai abhi XD
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
GenSec sir!
Bhai tere jitna reliable aur dependable insaan IITK mein aur koi nahi hai legit. Humne saath mein kitna zyada kaam kiya hai- TA201 project, pehli tech meet mein Mumbai jaana, TA202 project, itne saare batti, non-batti courses aur assignments, consulting prep- thanks for being the go-to guy in all of these! Tere elections ke time kaafi maza aaya tha, aur teri alag level personal growth bhi dekhne ko mili us time. Inter IIT jeetane ke liye badhaaiyan <3 
Bhai tu jald hi Mumbai transfer karwa le apna, phir regularly mil paayenge apan.
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text: Hey Nikita! Yup, Freshers’ Inferno Poker mein pehli baar mile the apan. TA201 lab wala yaad hai mujhe, but you don’t need to thank me for that :) EMEC lab mein to saath mein fraud maarte the apan XD Yep, dekhte hai kab milna hota hai!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text: Yo Pulkit! Mast aadmi hai tu. Banwa dunga tere liye hoodie pakka :)
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Ratnangshu Bhai!
Humanoid aur Roboclub ki bohot achchi memories hai tumhare saath :) 
Early days at humanoid were a lot more fun because of you. 1st year mein Esscel ko “manually” chalaane mein bohot maza aaya tha XD 
3rd year mein bhi club ka integral part rehne ke liye thanks a lot bhai! Also, Humanoid team ko itne achche se sambhalne ke liye bhi thank you <3
Milte hai jald hi. All the Best for all your endeavors!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Yo Saksham!
Bohot hardworking, reliable aur achcha insaan hai tu <3 Tere saath baat karne mein humesha maza aata tha. Batti lab mein bhi innuendos maarte maarte kaafi achcha time nikal jaata tha XD Yess, teri Urban Crave ki treat mein mazaa aaya tha.
Outreach Cell ki ppt mein tune mera naam likha tha aur maine tera <3 It would have been interesting to work with you here. Placements ke time bohot discuss karte the apan. PPO lene ke baad bhi meri bohot madat ki tune, thank you so much for that.
Let’s meet soon man. All the Best for your life ahead!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Mai aaj tak jitne bhi logo se mila hu, tere jitne tez aur shaant dimaag aur kisika nahi dekha bhai. Par first year se last year tak aate aate tera dimaag bohot saari alag directions mein sochne laga hai XD 
Yaad hai mai first year mein humesha tere aur shubham ke room pe brush karne aa jata tha XD tu kabhi gussa nahi hua par. 1st year mein ESC101 mein mera (border pe) A teri wajah se hi laga yaar. Thanks a lot for that
2nd year mein to apan room-mates hi the. I don’t think I was a good room-mate, par tu bohot zyada bakchod room-mate tha. 
Glad to play a small role in your exciting internship day. Aise hi chaapte rehna aur treats dete rehna <3
Wo OAT ki chat pe jaana alag level thrilling tha bhai, aur OAT ki chat se view bhi kya mast tha us din
Most importantly, bada aadmi banne pe bhul mat jaana mujhe bro <3
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Yo fellow mean girl! Bohot zyada maza aaya tha Galaxy ELS mein yaar. Apni 2nd year Dumb Charades team turned out to be strong man XD even with a random Y18. Middle East -> Football -> Jordan -> Petra of Jordan was some next-level stuff.  4th year mein it would have been even more fun.

Also, Outreach Cell mein apply kiya tha tab your motivation helped me a lot <3 Thank you so much for that. Also, insane respect for your creativity man. Time-travel wali short film was mind=blown.

Really glad to know you. Hoping we meet again sometime soon!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude

text:
Yo Chair Sir!
The first time we met was in your wing during your 1st year senator elections. Mai Nikunj ka campaigner ya kuch tha lol. It has been great to know you since then. 
Bohot meticulous aur hardworking insaan hai tu, but you somehow make everything look very easy for you. In my opinion, “Things are under control” ye reassuring image personify karta hai tu. EE DUGC, TA202 project, so many batti courses and assignments, consulting prep, random doubts, time pass - in sab ke liye you were just a text message away. (Typically replied within 30 seconds <3). Bohot trustworthy aur mast insaan hai tu. This thing, which I wrote a few months should go here imo-
Movie character Yash relates to: Andy Dufresne from Shawshank Redemption
Key strengths (3-4) they find in the candidate:
-Yash is extremely persistent and dedicated in all his efforts. 
-Along with being a good ideator, he has the execution skills necessary to take any such initiative to completion. 
-Yash is a delightful person to work with and never hesitates from going out of his way to support others. 

Tu Mumbai aa jaaye to aur zyada mazaa aayega! In either case, milte hai jald hi. All the Best bhai!
author: Neil Rajiv Shirude
